text: 3|173|Hitobito ga, kare-ra ni mukatte itta. `Mi nasai, anata gata ni taishite taigun ga shūketsu shite iru. Kare-ra o osorerubekidearu.'Daga kono koto ga kaette kare-ra no shinkō o fukameta. Soshite `watashi-tachi ni wa, arrā ga ireba banzendearu. Kare wa mottomo sugureta kanrisha de ara reru.' To itta.
